headlines.description: Second half strikes from captain Troy Deeney and Will Hughes gave Watford an impressive 3-1 win at Burnley on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deeney inspires Watford to victory at Burnley

video.headline: Burnley 1-3 Watford: Hornets' second half surge

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE ONLY Burnley 1-3 Watford: Hornets' second half surge

headlines.description: Sergio Aguero scored his 13th hat trick for Manchester City as the Premier League champions brushed Huddersfield aside.
headlines.shortLinkText: Aguero scores hat trick as Man City hit six

video.headline: Man City 6-1 Huddersfield: Aguero nets hat trick

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE ONLY Man City 6-1 Huddersfield: Aguero nets hat trick

events.name: Manchester United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Manchester United conceded three first-half goals as they slumped to a 3-2 defeat at Brighton in a game illuminated by a superb Glenn Murray goal.

video.headline: Brighton 3-2 Man United: Shock defeat for Mourinho

tracking.trackingName: AUS ONLY Brighton 3-2 Man United: Shock defeat for Mourinho

headlines.shortLinkText: United slump to dismal defeat at Brighton
